lead_paragraph: Jeffrey P. Bezos, the founder of Amazon.com, has agreed to buy The Washington Post for $250 million in cash, in a deal that has shocked the newspaper industry. Donald E. Graham, chairman and chief executive of The Washington Post Company, said he and the publisher “decided to sell only after years of familiar newspaper-industry challenges made us wonder if there might be another owner who would be better for the Post.” The sale is expected to be completed within 60 days.

headline.main: Bezos Buys a Landmark in Washington
